abstract: Carrafiello-Diehl & Associates, a well-known advertising agency in the Northeast, is being absorbed by an agency named the Gate Worldwide.
snippet: Carrafiello-Diehl & Associates, a well-known advertising agency in the Northeast, is being absorbed by an agency named the Gate Worldwide.
lead_paragraph: A well-known advertising agency in the Northeast, Carrafiello-Diehl & Associates, is closing and its remaining accounts and employees are being absorbed by an agency named the Gate Worldwide.
